Sys::DbugStdout Class Reference

Debug Stdout Class. More...

Inheritance diagram for Sys::DbugStdout:

Detailed Description

This class uses Dbug and a standard output to create a concrete debugging class. The following is an example of how to use the debugger:

DbugStdout d; //use the standard output for debugging
d.setmode(Dbug::DECIMAL, 8); //decimal mode with 8 leading zeros
d << "My number in DECIMAL " << 1123 << "\n";
d.setmode(Dbug::BINARY, 8); //decimal mode with 8 leading zeros
d << "My number in BINARY " << 1123 << "\n";
